courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of playing the guitar, including chords, scales, and strumming techniques.

courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: An introductory course to piano, covering basic notes, finger placement, and simple melodies.

courses.title: Advanced Violin Techniques
courses.description: Refine your violin skills with advanced bowing, finger positioning, and orchestral techniques.

courses.title: Singing and Vocal Training
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, pitch control, and breathing techniques with expert guidance.
